languages.text: Аванпост "Принцесса Ифрита" с трепетом и счастьем приветствует Вольного Торговца. В последний раз столь высокая честь была оказана этому миру много десятилетий назад, когда Ее Светлость Теодора фон Валанциус повелела основать здесь поселение, после чего никогда не интересовалась его судьбой.

The Princess of Efreet Outpost sends its awed and joyous greetings to the Rogue Trader. The last time so great an honour was granted to this world was many decades ago, when Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius ordered that a settlement be founded here and thereafter showed no interest in its fate.
languages.original_text: Аванпост "Принцесса Ифрита" с трепетом и счастьем приветствует Вольного Торговца. В последний раз столь высокая честь была оказана этому миру много десятилетий назад, когда Ее Светлость Теодора фон Валанциус повелела основать здесь поселение, после чего никогда не интересовалась его судьбой.

traits.locale_text: The Princess of Efreet Outpost sends its awed and joyous greetings to the Rogue Trader. The last time so great an honour was granted to this world was many decades ago, when Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius ordered that a settlement be founded here and thereafter showed no interest in its fate.

The Princess of Efreet Outpost sends its awed and joyous greetings to the Rogue Trader. The last time so great an honour was granted to this world was many decades ago, when Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius ordered that a settlement be founded here and thereafter showed no interest in its fate.

The Princess of Efreet Outpost sends its awed and joyous greetings to the Rogue Trader. The last time so great an honour was granted to this world was many decades ago, when Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius ordered that a settlement be founded here and thereafter showed no interest in its fate.

The Princess of Efreet Outpost sends its awed and joyous greetings to the Rogue Trader. The last time so great an honour was granted to this world was many decades ago, when Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius ordered that a settlement be founded here and thereafter showed no interest in its fate.

languages.text: 艾弗里特公主前哨站向行商浪人致以崇高而喜悦的问候。这个世界上一次获得如此殊荣，已经是几十年前的事情了。那个时候，西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯夫人下令在这里建立一座新的定居点，此后就再也没关心过这个地方的境况。
languages.original_text: The Princess of Efreet Outpost sends its awed and joyous greetings to the Rogue Trader. The last time so great an honour was granted to this world was many decades ago, when Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius ordered that a settlement be founded here and thereafter showed no interest in its fate.

traits.locale_text: 艾弗里特公主前哨站向行商浪人致以崇高而喜悦的问候。这个世界上一次获得如此殊荣，已经是几十年前的事情了。那个时候，西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯夫人下令在这里建立一座新的定居点，此后就再也没关心过这个地方的境况。

languages.text: 前哨拠点「イフリートの王女」が自由開拓者に畏敬と喜びの挨拶を送る。この惑星にこのような栄誉が与えられたのは、何十年も前、シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウス女史がこの地に入植地を作り上げるように命じた時のことだ。しかし、その後、彼女はその運命には何の関心を示さなかった。
languages.original_text: The Princess of Efreet Outpost sends its awed and joyous greetings to the Rogue Trader. The last time so great an honour was granted to this world was many decades ago, when Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius ordered that a settlement be founded here and thereafter showed no interest in its fate.

traits.locale_text: 前哨拠点「イフリートの王女」が自由開拓者に畏敬と喜びの挨拶を送る。この惑星にこのような栄誉が与えられたのは、何十年も前、シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウス女史がこの地に入植地を作り上げるように命じた時のことだ。しかし、その後、彼女はその運命には何の関心を示さなかった。

languages.text: El puesto avanzado Princesa de Efreet envía saludos pletóricos y asombrados a su Comerciante Independiente. La última vez que recibieron un honor semejante en este mundo fue cuando Theodora von Valancius fundó el asentamiento e inmediatamente se desentendió de su destino.
languages.original_text: The Princess of Efreet Outpost sends its awed and joyous greetings to the Rogue Trader. The last time so great an honour was granted to this world was many decades ago, when Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius ordered that a settlement be founded here and thereafter showed no interest in its fate.

traits.locale_text: El puesto avanzado Princesa de Efreet envía saludos pletóricos y asombrados a su Comerciante Independiente. La última vez que recibieron un honor semejante en este mundo fue cuando Theodora von Valancius fundó el asentamiento e inmediatamente se desentendió de su destino.

languages.text: L'avant-poste de la « Princesse d'Éfrit » fait parvenir ses salutations les plus sincères et joyeuses {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. Voilà plusieurs décennies que ce monde n'avait pas reçu un tel honneur, lorsque Sa Seigneurie Théodora von Valancius avait ordonné la fondation d'une colonie à cet endroit, avant de se désintéresser totalement de son sort.
languages.original_text: The Princess of Efreet Outpost sends its awed and joyous greetings to the Rogue Trader. The last time so great an honour was granted to this world was many decades ago, when Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius ordered that a settlement be founded here and thereafter showed no interest in its fate.

traits.locale_text: L'avant-poste de la « Princesse d'Éfrit » fait parvenir ses salutations les plus sincères et joyeuses {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. Voilà plusieurs décennies que ce monde n'avait pas reçu un tel honneur, lorsque Sa Seigneurie Théodora von Valancius avait ordonné la fondation d'une colonie à cet endroit, avant de se désintéresser totalement de son sort.

languages.text: Die Prinzessin des Efreet-Außenpostens sendet {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} ihre ehrfürchtigen und freudigen Grüße. Es ist schon viele Jahrzehnte her, dass dieser Welt eine so große Ehre zuteil wurde. Das letzte Mal passierte es, als Ihre Ladyschaft Theodora von Valancius anordnete, dass hier eine Siedlung entstehen sollte. Allerdings zeigte sie danach keinerlei Interesse mehr am Schicksal der Siedlung.
languages.original_text: The Princess of Efreet Outpost sends its awed and joyous greetings to the Rogue Trader. The last time so great an honour was granted to this world was many decades ago, when Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius ordered that a settlement be founded here and thereafter showed no interest in its fate.

traits.locale_text: Die Prinzessin des Efreet-Außenpostens sendet {mf|dem Freihänder|der Freihändlerin} ihre ehrfürchtigen und freudigen Grüße. Es ist schon viele Jahrzehnte her, dass dieser Welt eine so große Ehre zuteil wurde. Das letzte Mal passierte es, als Ihre Ladyschaft Theodora von Valancius anordnete, dass hier eine Siedlung entstehen sollte. Allerdings zeigte sie danach keinerlei Interesse mehr am Schicksal der Siedlung.

languages.text: İfrit Prensesi Karakolu, Hür Tacir'e saygı ve sevinç dolu selamlarını göndermekte. Bu dünyaya böylesi büyük bir onur, en son on yılar önce bahşedilmişti. Leydi Theodora von Valancius Hazretleri, burada bir yerleşim yeri kurulması emrini vermiş ve sonrasında buraya ne olacağıyla hiçbir şekilde ilgilenmemişti.
languages.original_text: The Princess of Efreet Outpost sends its awed and joyous greetings to the Rogue Trader. The last time so great an honour was granted to this world was many decades ago, when Her Ladyship Theodora von Valancius ordered that a settlement be founded here and thereafter showed no interest in its fate.

traits.locale_text: İfrit Prensesi Karakolu, Hür Tacir'e saygı ve sevinç dolu selamlarını göndermekte. Bu dünyaya böylesi büyük bir onur, en son on yılar önce bahşedilmişti. Leydi Theodora von Valancius Hazretleri burada bir yerleşim yeri kurulması emrini vermiş ve sonrasında buraya ne olacağıyla herhangi bir şekilde ilgilenmemişti.
